headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Limited-Time Offer: Get Bonus Cash for Buying a Shark Card
content:
Exclusive offer for you: get 100% bonus in-game cash for purchasing a Great White Shark Card! That's a bonus $1,250,000 to spend however you want across Los Santos & Blaine County.

Offer valid until 02/01. All Shark Cards must be redeemed before 02/01. Your bonus cash will be deposited into your Maze Bank account within 72 hours after each Shark Card redemption.

For details on additional discounts and bonuses running this week in GTA Online, visit the Rockstar Newswire.
